set_size(n)¶

Set the column size

Usage:

ps = rptObj.ui.layouts.grid()

ps += [rptObj.ui.text(“test %s” % i) for i in range(5)] ps[0][0].set_size(10)

to_word(document)¶

Apply the corresponding function to produce the same result in a word document. This function is very specific and it has to be defined in each class.

http://python-docx.readthedocs.io/en/latest/

to_xls(workbook, worksheet, cursor)¶

Apply the corresponding function to produce the same result in a word document. This function is very specific and it has to be defined in each class.

https://xlsxwriter.readthedocs.io/

resize()¶

For the resizing of the space for the containers.

This will rescale based on the number of items and the fact that the max per row is 12 It will update the colsDim list

add_icon(text, css=None, position='after')¶

Add an icon to the HTML object

Example checks.title.add_icon(“fas fa-align-center”)

Documentation

Parameters

  • text – The icon reference from font awsome website

  • css – Optional. A dictionary with the CSS style to be added to the component

  • position –

Returns

The Html object

click_item(i, jsFncs, profile=False)¶

Parameters

  • i – Integer. The item index

  • jsFncs – Array. The Javascript functions

  • profile –

on(event, jsFncs, profile=False)¶

Parameters

  • jsFncs – Array. The Javascript functions

  • profile –

Returns

class epyk.core.html.HtmlContainer.Td(report, htmlObjs, header, position, width, height, align, options, profile)¶
colspan(i)¶

The colspan attribute defines the number of columns a cell should span.

https://www.w3schools.com/tags/att_td_colspan.asp

Parameters

i –

rowspan(i)¶

The rowspan attribute specifies the number of rows a cell should span.

https://www.w3schools.com/tags/att_td_rowspan.asp

Parameters

i –
